entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 03:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
